title: UTMB Health Student Health Medical & Counseling Scheduling
author: Student Health [https; Www Utmb Edu; Studenthealth
cleaned_text: After Hours Care: After hours, weekends, and holidays, you may call the Access Center at 409-772-2222 or 800-917-8906. Telephone triage is provided by the Hotline and physician backup consultation is available. Emergencies: Please go directly to the nearest emergency room. Students are responsible for all charges related to emergency care.
